questions.question: How did Desdemona fall in love with Othello?

choices.answer: Othello told her stories about his dangerous adventures

questions.question: What is the significance of the handkerchief?

choices.answer: The handkerchief was a memento from Desdemona's mother
A representation of Othello's hate for Desdemona
It symbolized Othello's love for Desdemona
It describes the relationship between Desdemona and Cassio

questions.question: Why was Iago jealous of Cassio?

choices.answer: Cassio took all of Othello's attention
Cassio was appointed lieutenant instead of Iago

questions.question: What other character falls under the theme of jealousy besides Othello?
What was the song of "Willow" foreshadowing?
Who did Cassio fight with and wounded during the party in Cyprus when he was drunk?
What was Iago's advice to Cassio after being striped from his position by Othello?

choices.answer: To take his time, Othello will give him back his position
Talk to Desdemona, she might convince Othello

questions.question: After Emilia found the handkerchief and gave it to Iago, what did Iago do with it?

choices.answer: He implanted it in Cassio's room
He kept it safe in his apartment
He said to Emilia to keep it
He gave it to Othello saying Cassio had it

questions.question: With what did Brabantio think Othello won Desdemona over?
What is the tone in the majority of the play?
Which character dominates the tone in the play? (Hint: Who speaks to the audience the most?)
What did Iago NOT say to convince Othello that Desdemona was cheating on him?

choices.answer: Cassio had an affair with Desdemona on Othello's bed
Cassio ran away with Desdemona during the night
He saw Cassio with Desdemona's handkercheif
Cassio was dreaming of having an affair with Desdemona

questions.question: What did Lodovico's letter say that angered Othello?

choices.answer: Iago will be appointed as the new lieutenant
Cassio would be appointed as governor in Othello's place

questions.question: What is the last thing Desdemona plea to Othello before being suffocated?

choices.answer: To live until the next morning
To be sent back to her home
To be forgiven for her sins

questions.question: Which character tells the truth, and finally foils Iago's plan in the end?
